TextView.android:text: I have created an Android application similar to that of Toppr, Gradeup for the organisation Thinkmerit, which gives free online IIT training for +1 and +2 students. Whole app is created by me, with some help from friends.
Android Application Developer And Backend Developer
Developing Frontend and Backend Android Application for Management Information System(MIS) of our Institution. Backend is in express.js which is based on node.js
Created whole Android app for thinkmerit startup, which provide IIT coaching for +1 and +2 students.
We have developed an Algorithm for optimisation of 3-D Stacked Integrated Circuits , which can increase the speed of processors.
Developed a standalone Application of School Management System in Netbeans environment by using MySQL for backend.
